Control Name: 3.4.2 Capacity utilization is monitored and used to forecast future growth.
Control Statement: Predicting future growth and capacity demands can prevent outages due to insufficient provisioned capacity over time.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.4 How have you accounted for capacity and scaling requirements of your workload?
control_attributes.Control: 3.4.2 Capacity utilization is monitored and used to forecast future growth.
control_attributes.Description: Predicting future growth and capacity demands can prevent outages due to insufficient provisioned capacity over time.
